articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
​Another batch of new strains have been entered, and we're curious to see how many you've tried! We've got new Girl Scout Cookie hybrids for the Cookie lovers and Spartan warlord-themed sativas for fans of brutality ripped dudes in capes. Even more new varieties can be found in the Leafly Explorer (remember: you can sort by newest or you can use our strain filters to select from custom effects, flavors, and benefits).
All right, strain hunters — go forth, explore, and document your adventures in a strain review!
 
 1. Motavation
Characteristics of Motavation:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Sensi Star and Warlock
Sweet, fruity, and floral aroma
Heavy and relaxing with some creativity
May help with anxiety, muscle spasms, pain, and insomnia

 
 2. Leonidas
Characteristics of Leonidas:

Mostly sativa strain
Super Silver Haze variation produced by Canadian LP Tweed
Cross between Haze, Skunk #1, and Northern Lights
Happy, focused effects
Sour citrus aroma
May help with depression, fatigue, and stress

 
 3. Blue Cookies
Characteristics of Blue Cookies:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) and Blueberry
Sweet berry and cherry aroma
Intense cerebral euphoria coupled with full-body relaxation

 
 4. Nova
Characteristics of Nova:

80/20 high-CBD indica-dominant strain
Canadian LP Tweed’s version of Pennywise
Sweet woody and spicy pepper aroma
Relaxed and focused effects
May help treat pain, anxiety, inflammation, and stress disorders

 
 5. Bogart
Characteristics of Bogart:

Hybrid strain
A rendition of OG Kush distributed by Canadian LP Tweed 
Earthy, woody pine aroma
Suitable for consumers with a high tolerance
May help with PTSD, nausea, pain, and stress.

 
 6. Super Bud
Characteristics of Super Bud:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Big Bud and Skunk
Sweet, fruity aroma
Heavily relaxing effects

 
 7. Sunshine
Characteristics of Sunshine:

Sativa-dominant strain
Produced by the Canadian LP Peace Naturals Project
Sweet fruity and citrus flavors
Blissful, happy, uplifted effects
May help treat pain, nausea, and appetite loss
articles.title: New Strains Alert: Motavation, Leonidas, Blue Cookies, Bogart, and More

articles.author: Lisa Rough
articles.text:
As 2014 has come to a close, we look back and reflect on the strain reviews of yesteryear. We laughed, we cried, and we never underestimated the power of the munchies in some of our more vocal Leafly users. Here are our favorite strain reviews from 2014:
10. GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies)
This review sums up the glory, the deliciousness, and the pungency of cannabis (Lil’ Wayne, though? Seriously?)

Cannabis has many things to be proud of and this strain is it.. pretty sure leafly was created on it.. god created yoga pants on it, the oceans grew, the gods bathe in it, its little waynes cologne… well maybe

9. Ed Rosenthal Super Bud
Has the Space Coyote helped you find your soulmate yet?

This stuff knocks me out, not in the sleepy way, but in the "Homer Simpson meets the Space Coyote" sort of way.

8. Blueberry Headband
Gross, but points for being descriptive.

Gave me a warm happy feeling. Kind of like peeing in a hot tub.

7. Green Crack
One of Leafly’s most popular strains inspired this poetic ode to cannabis.

Mind=bent 
Lovely scent 
Dank lament 
Go cannabis

6. Blueberry
Cannabis: saving the world by relieving PMS.

It is good for pms all of my homicidal thoughts have gone away as well as pain I am high right now. nobody has to die tonight. Thanks pot :)

5. Nepalese
Sometimes you inhale cannabis and exhale sunshine and rainbows and it’s just….it’s just great.

This stuff made me like everyone and positive and upbeat like I ate a cloud and rainbows or something.

4. Sour Diesel
One of our most WTF strain reviews in 2014 was short and sweet and completely baffling.

Instructions not clear Dick stuck in fan

3. Super Lemon Haze
Any experiences toker will tell you, Super Lemon Haze is a fun, upbeat, and energetic strain. Add tequila at your own discretion.

Kicks you right in the ass if paired with tequila. And by kicked in the ass i mean set on fire and dancing naked.  

2. Banana OG
I think we’ve all felt this before – so enamored with the joy of your munchies when all of the mesmerizing flavors combine in your mouth, it’s just one blissful, delicious hug.

"Smoked this. About 20 mins later I felt like a little girl skipping through a wheat field towards an ice cream with arms n legs before a choc chip cookie, also with arms and legs, skipped towards us making the happiest group hug I've ever had inside a baskin robbins. =)"

1. Purple Haze
Easily our favorite strain review from 2014, the compelling tale of an adventurer and his crustacean companion won our hearts and made us wish that we, too, had a little crawdad friend.

Took me from down in the dumps to having a cool time. Went on an adventure and found a crawdad. I subsequently made friends with said crawdad and hung out with him. Man I miss Craymond.
articles.title: The Leafly Strain Reviews Hall of Fame: 2014 Year In Review Edition

description: Super Bud (or Superbud) is an indica-dominant cross between Big Bud and Skunk bred by Green House Seeds. In a show of its indica genetics, Super Bud delivers heavily relaxing effects that help eliminate insomnia, pain, and appetite loss. It has a sweet, fruity aroma that is cherished by connoisseurs and a fast flowering time that appeals to commercial growers.
descriptionPlain: Super Bud (or Superbud) is an indica-dominant cross between Big Bud and Skunk bred by Green House Seeds. In a show of its indica genetics, Super Bud delivers heavily relaxing effects that help eliminate insomnia, pain, and appetite loss. It has a sweet, fruity aroma that is cherished by connoisseurs and a fast flowering time that appeals to commercial growers.

growInfo.growNotes:
Requires a low-humidity environment when grown outdoors
	Suitable for screen of green (SCRoG) and sea of green (SoG) methods
	Indoor yields typically fall around 900 grams per square meter
	Outdoor yields typically fall around 1000 grams per plant

highlightedReviews.text: to this day Superbud has got to be the nicest smoke I've ever had. Very fresh fruity smoke with a beautiful giggly high. Excellent choice
Absolutely amazing strain. Stress free high. #notetomyself GO EASY if smoking first time.

name: Super Bud
